00014 template <class T> class ImageList : public  vector< CountedRef<T> > 
00015 #ifdef USE_ROOT
00016 , public TObject 
00017 #endif /* USE_ROOT */
00018 {
00019 
00020 private:
00021   bool shouldDelete;

00025   ImageList(const bool ShouldDelete = true) 
00026       {shouldDelete = ShouldDelete;};
00027 
00028   typedef typename vector<CountedRef<T> >::iterator iterator;
00029   typedef typename vector<CountedRef<T> >::const_iterator const_iterator;
00030

00033   friend ostream& operator << (ostream & stream, const ImageList& aList) 
00034     { aList.dump(stream); return stream;}
00035 
00037   void dump(ostream& stream = cout) const 
00038   { for (const_iterator ri = begin(); ri != end(); ++ri) (*ri)->dump(stream);}
